Title: Sharepoint - Query Based Lookup Field Control
Description:
This is one of my older projects having two custom field definitions:

1. the Parent-Child control (improved on the Datacogs solution)
2. Query Based Look Up Field Control
HomeWiki:
Project Description

A custom field control for WSS 3.0/MOSS 2007 to get filtered data from other list based on complex queries that is otherwise not possible through OOTB lookup field.

This is one of my older projects having two custom field definitions:

1. the Parent-Child control (improved on the Datacogs solution)
2. Query Based Look Up Field Control
